en.title: Desenvolvedor Fullstack | .NET & React
en.aboutMe: Sou um desenvolvedor software com quase 10 anos de experiência, minhas especialidades são construir apis com .NET, aplicações front-end com React, bancos de dados relacionais e cloud AWS.

pt.title: Fullstack Developer | .NET & React
pt.aboutMe: I am a software developer with nearly 10 years of experience. My specialties include building APIs with .NET, front-end applications with React, relational databases, and AWS cloud.
